item.title: Visual Studio Item Templates vs .NET Templates in 2023
item.description: Long ago, one of the ways we'd get some reuse out of standard and utility files would be by exporting item templates. Since the .NET CLI rolled around, the approach has been different and much easier.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: Deploying .NET templates using GitHub Actions
item.description: Once you've created a .NET template, you should automate the updates of the package using GitHub actions to remove the effort required in publishing updates
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
